ygData.subject: Re: Buying and Selling Songs
ygData.msgSnippet: You can buy the scroll but you cannot scribe or memorize it until the proper level. Good Journey, Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule) ... From: Mike Roach
ygData.messageBody:
You can buy the scroll but you cannot scribe or memorize it until the
proper level.

Good Journey,

Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)


-----Original Message-----
From: Mike Roach [mailto:mroach@...]
Sent: Friday, May 14, 1999 12:28 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Buying and Selling Songs


From: Mike Roach <mroach@...>

Also can you buy a higher level song than the level you have currently
obtained and scribe it before you reach the level that you can acutally use
it?

Faras of Qeynos
Half-Elf Bard
E'Ci Server

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Douglas Bierbower [mailto:Bierbower@...]
> Sent: Friday, May 14, 1999 12:32 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: [eqbards] Buying and Selling Songs
>
>
> From: Douglas Bierbower <Bierbower@...>
>
> I also got burned by the one lore item limitation. I tried
> to buy two copies of
> two songs in Kelthin and paid for all four but only ended up
> with one copy of
> each. I petitioned and was told, in essence, tough luck.
> Thanks for the great
> documentation Verant. It appears that this has been
> corrected a little. I put
> a copy of a song in the bank and tried to purchase another
> copy and it would not
> sell it to me. Good work Verant. I still want my platinum back.
>
> I do not know if I can buy a song that I have already
> scribed. Has anyone tried
> that?
>
> Narcissus of Povar, Bard of the 17th Song
>
>
